snippet.title: OBSCURE FPS - Metathrone - Lev. 1 - GAMEPLAY
snippet.description:
OBSCURE FPS Gameplay

Title: Metathrone
Year: 2008
Developer: Orion Games
Publisher: Perfect Play Entertainment 

Description:
Strange and complicated mix of stuff in this one: an alternative anime world, where two human races peacefully coexist, until the disover of the metathrone, an ancient artifact with unknown powers.
Reminds a bit of Deus-ex here and a bit of F.E.A.R. there, stealth gameplay somehow and you can even turn into a raging mutant!!
One of the obscurest games here, though...
